bill.summary: 10/20/2005--Introduced. Amends the Community Disaster Loan Act of 2005 to repeal the prohibition against cancelling (thus permitting the cancellation) of certain disaster loans authorized under the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to assist local governments in providing essential services.
